forest1.description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

actions.climb tree: There are no branches low enough to climb.

forest2.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands at the edge of a clearing.

forest3.description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be a clearing.

forest4.description: The forest thins out here, revealing a steep cliff. The ground slopes down to the east.

climb cliff.message: Using the rope, you climb down the cliff.

forest5.description: This is a dark forest. The trees are very close together here.

forest6.description: This is a dark forest. A path leads south, and a narrow trail heads northeast.

dense forest.description: This is a very dense part of the forest. Twisted trees block most paths.

actions.examine trees: The trees are ancient and gnarled.

forest clearing.description: You are in a clearing, with forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.

up a tree.description: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is out of reach. Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.

actions.examine nest: There is a large egg in the nest.

cliff base.description: You are at the base of a steep cliff. A path leads north along the cliff, and another path heads east.

climb cliff.message: Using the rope, you climb up the cliff.

rocky ledge.description: You are on a rocky ledge overlooking a deep canyon. A path leads south along the cliff.

actions.examine canyon: The canyon is deep and treacherous.
